member.name: M:Npgsql.FSharp.Analyzers.SyntacticAnalysis.applyLiterals(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpMap{System.String,System.String},Npgsql.FSharp.Analyzers.SqlOperation)
member.summary: Tries to replace [<Literal>] strings inside the module with the identifiers that were used with Sql.query.

member.name: M:Npgsql.FSharp.Analyzers.SqlAnalysis.analyzeOperation(Npgsql.FSharp.Analyzers.SqlOperation,System.String,Npgsql.FSharp.Analyzers.InformationSchema.DbSchemaLookups)
member.summary: Uses database schema that is retrieved once during initialization and re-used when analyzing the rest of the Sql operation blocks

member.name: M:Npgsql.FSharp.Analyzers.SqlAnalysis.databaseSchema(System.String)
